briefDescription: mask; long necked mask w/ 2 human heads back to back, each w/ pair of horns above; heads are painted white w/ red and black features; reddish brown pigment between faces; 4 lacing holes in neck w/ plaited yellow raffia (?) through them; h. 41.1 cm.
